content: रोहित {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (रोहिता|रोहिणी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) Red, red-coloured. --तः {@--1@} Red colour. {@--2@} A fox. {@--3@} A kind of deer. {@--4@} A red horse. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of Hariśchandra's son. {@--6@} A kind of fish. --तं {@--1@} Blood. {@--2@} Saffron. {@--3@} A straight rain-bow.
